mapper.select: select c.*, out_regdt(c.regdt) as regtime, m.* from cts c join mem m on c.mno = m.mno where c.ctscateno=#{ctscateno} and c.ctsno=#{ctsno} and c.delyn='n'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(c idx_cts_regdt_joacnt) */ 'joa' AS gubun, c.* FROM cts c WHERE delyn='n' and ROWNUM < 5 UNION ALL SELECT /*+ index_desc(c idx_cts_regdt_readcnt) */ 'read' AS gubun, c.* FROM cts c WHERE delyn='n' and ROWNUM < 5 ) A
select * from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM vw_mem_levpoint WHERE ROWNUM < 51 ) A ORDER BY dbms_random.VALUE) v where rownum < 10
select * from ctscate order by ctscateno
select cd.ctsdatno , cd.ctsno , cd.mno , cd.ctt , cd.regdt , out_regdt(cd.regdt) as regtime , m.niknm from ctsdat cd join mem m on cd.mno = m.mno where ctscateno=#{ctscateno} and ctsno=#{ctsno}
